entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • dotnet build leaves lingering dotnet processes on raspberry pi (debian) #41870
  • Question: VS2019.1.4 & RunCommand & launchsettings.json => The "RunCommand" property is not defined. #12074

PullRequests

Created

  • Permit loose manifest priority #41996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Static Web Assets] Fix duplicate endpoints when resolving referenced asset endpoints #41995
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • make verified files as lf and utf8 #41992
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41985
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix workload install or update with workload set specified in global.json #41983
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41929
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2489036 #41887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
